EmailTemplate.description: Automatically sent to new dealer contact when converted from lead.
EmailTemplate.name: New Dealer Welcome
EmailTemplate.subject: YETI Coolers Dealer Approval & Forms
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{NAME}},
Thank you for your order from Yeti Coolers. Once your package ships we will send an email with a link to track your order. You can check the status of your order by logging into your account. If you have any questions about your order please contact us at support@example.com or call us Monday - Friday, 8am - 5pm PST.
Your order confirmation is below. Thank you again for your business.
order #{{ordernumber}} (placed on {{date}})
